title: Death's Excellent Vacation
description: New York Times bestselling authors Charlaine Harris, Katie MacAlister, Jeaniene Frost â€“ plus Lilith Saintcrow, Jeff Abbott, and more â€“ send postcards from the edge of the paranormal world to fans who devoured Wolfsbane and Mistletoe and Many Bloody Returns. With an all-new Sookie Stackhouse story and twelve other original tales, editors Charlaine Harris and Toni L. P. Kelner bring together a stellar collection of tour guides who offer vacations that are frightening, funny, and touching for the fanged, the furry, the demonic, and the grotesque. Learn why it really can be an endless summer â€“ for immortals. Praise for the editors' previous "Exceptional authorsâ€¦a captivating collection.
